constituent: repudiate, finger, fingers, un-, jail cell, prison bars
koohiiStory1: When ordered to go to the jail cell, the defendant gave the judge the finger and said he repudiated all that the legal system stood for if they were going to send an innocent man like him to jail.
koohiiStory2: He reached his fingers through the bars of his jail cell, trying to touch his beloved. But she repudiated him and left.
words:
排除(はいじょ): exclusion, removal, rejection
排水(はいすい): drainage
